explanation: [0-0] A young man with short black hair is standing by a foosball table. He's wearing a fuchsia T-shirt with a black pattern and has a small soccer ball in his mouth. He's looking straight ahead with his eyes wide open. The side of the table is brown, and the surface is green with several silver metal rods. On the rods are white plastic players and metal springs. Behind the man is a white wall with a window above.

[0-7] The man then spits the ball to the opposite side. The ball hits a plastic player in front of him and bounces back. The man turns his head to the right to catch the ball with his mouth. Next, he continues to spit the ball to the left and right, and the ball bounces back into his mouth repeatedly. Finally, the video returns to the initial scene.
